sub_title: CIO at Expereo | Faster to the future
summary:
I have 20+ years of work experience as IT manager, IT program and project manager applied in international context in Cloud Computing, Internet, Telecom or E-Commerce industries.

Starting in 2000 at Capgemini Telecom and Media for 5 years where I have been leading teams for the implementation of billing and CRM systems, I have been dealing with complex information systems architecture, multiple project contexts and technologies while learning the fundamentals of project management, quality control, customer expectations management and team leading.

In 2005 I co-founded Inoven, a consulting firm with a focus on bridging the gap between business and technologies. While leading teams on client side acting as Program/Project Manager, I have been involved in the development of the company from 5 co-founders to 40 consultants in 2010.

From 2010 on, I started as independent IT Consultant, with a focus on cloud solutions, digital transformation and agile methodologies. In finding the right blend and most appropriate methodology between classic (waterfall) and iterative/discovery (agile, lean) approach while supporting bi-modal IT mode where both legacy and new innovative product discovery can co-exist.

I am now fulfilling the position of Chief Information Officer at Expereo. Expereo is a Global Managed Services provider who specialises in internet connectivity.  We are a company that has unrivalled knowledge and experience of global IP connectivity to enable our customers’ businesses to move faster to the future.  We deliver secure, global network connectivity for businesses wherever they need to operate, with solutions designed for the business needs of our hyperconnected world.  Expereo understands the internet better than anyone else. And we pride ourselves on delivering the personal touches you need to successfully progress to your global digital future. It’s no surprise our solutions already power enterprise and government sites around the world, and we are the trusted partner of Fortune 500 companies.

Personal profile:
•	Easily and quickly adapt to technical and multi-cultural environments
•	Positive, dynamic and unifying management approach
•	Pragmatic, hands on - cost and results oriented
•	Able to both operate at top level management, and to dive into technical aspects.
•	Certified Scrum Master
•	Certified Prince2 Foundation Practitioner

projects.title: T-Mobile Netherlands - Program Management for the Tender of IT operations outsourcing
projects.description:
Managed the Program to tender the entire IT operations

o	Setup program governance and streams
o	Overlooked the entire procurement process RFP process from writing of the RFI to final RFP, offer review and tenders interviews to final selection and contract
o	Successful tender of the IT operations outsourcing averaging €30M annum to different suppliers in Europe and India, resulting in the selection (Comsote, Greece) and change of provider (initially T-Systems, Netherlands)
o	Managed all stakeholders from MT, legacy supplier and all potential tenders

projects.title: Vente-Privée.com, France - Project Portfolio Management System
projects.description:
Project Manager to select and implement the new system
- Audit of current processes and formalization of the Project Management Process
- Followed-up on-going projects to review consistency of deliverables with new methodology
- Trained and followed Project Managers and the organization to implement the new methodology
- Selection of Project Portfolio Management System
- Supplier selection and management 
- Definition of Executive Dashboards and indicators
- Selection of an contractor to initiate the Enterprise Architecture Project

Context: Vente-Privée.com is one of the biggest online retailers in France with an extreme growth. To manage and prioritize the changes within the company, the Project Management department needed procedures and a system to support the decisions.

profile_positions.description:
Managing complex projects with multidisciplinary and international teams, partners and suppliers
•	Support supplier’s selection and contractual discussions
•	Setup project governance, streams and teams
•	Initiate and manage projects throughout the complete lifecycle
•	Promote good practice and process optimization
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
Inoven co-Founder and Partner
Consultant - Project Manager

InovenAltenor is a management, organization and innovation consulting firm. Since 2005 with more than 70 consultants, InovenAltenor works with major national and international players and fast growing startups leading innovation in the world. We work with our customers to think, plan, design and lead their studies, their rfp, their complex projects and program of digital and agile transformation. Our expertise and cross expertise for large service operators (Telecom, Bank, Insurance, Financial Services, Gaming, Retail and Utilities) give us a unique positioning and make InovenAltenor a key partner in helping customers in their transformation plans (new innovative combining products and services, Offers migration, IT transformation, …), their move to emerging innovative market (Mobile Banking, Mobility, NFC, Smartgrid, …) and their digital transformation (Mobility, Social, Collaboration).
